title: Digital Thermometer Indoor Hygrometer Room Temperature Monitor Humidity Gauge with Big Screen Stand Wall Hanging Magnet Greenhouse House Kitchen Car
features: LARGE, CLEAR DIGITS: The temperature and humidity can be easily read with large clear digits showing on the big LCD screen, for just a glance.

2 TYPES PLACEMENT: You can put it on the refrigerator with its strong magnet on its back, and place it on table-top with its retractable stand. The samll magnet is in the back, which is show on the pictures.
TEMPERATURE (°F /°C) HUMIDITY DISPLAY: This thermometer/hygrometer can display temperature and humidity. Room thermometer can show in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
MAX/LOW RECORDS: The digital thermometer automatically records the highest and lowest temperature. Reset the records by poke the reset socket on the back of the device.
INDICATE COMFORT CONDITION: Smile face appears while indoor temperature & humidity in the comfort range for human.
description: Temperature & Humidity display. Large digits on big LCD screen. Record MAX/MIN Values of indoor temperature and humidity. Fahrenheit/Celsius (℉/℃) changeable. 2 putting methods: [1] magnetic stick [2] table stand. Super low power-consumption.

Indoor Temperature Range: 14℉ ~ 122℉ (-10℃ ~ 50℃)  Indoor Humidity Range: 20% ~ 90% RH Power-supply: 1.5V(AG13)*1 Smile face appears at indoor temperature: 64℉ ~ 77℉ (18℃ ~ 25℃) & humidity: 40% RH ~ 65% RH. Sad face appears at other indoor temperature & humidity.
Thermo-hygrometer * 1; Battery; User manual * 1 (Please read the manual before using).
